2164.subject: ED
2164.course_title_long: Reading & Writing Strategies for Monolingual & Bilingual Learners
2164.descrlong: Reading & Writing Strategies for Monolingual & Bilingual Learners: This course for the Reading Certificate will continue the foundation gained in MAE 630 and will further develop candidates' skills in curriculum and evidence-based teaching methods required to create self-sufficient and independent readers from elementary school through high school.
